text: @realDonaldTrump Great.  Can’t wait to hear details about the national COVID-19 testing plan & a coordinated, national effort to save lives in American nursing homes.  You know, crisis leadership sort of stuff.  Stepping up to the situation.  Instilling hope.  Showing empathy.  We’ll be watching.
